transcript.text: Use our company resources to make sure you stay on the right track when it comes to sourcing competitive intelligence.

panelText.text: Our Company has resources to help you get this right.

• You might have questions about how to gather and use competitive intelligence. If so, seek guidance from the Law or Compliance team.
  • If someone has gathered competitive information improperly, or if you have been improperly offered competitive information, you can:
    • talk to your manager
    • talk to the Law or Compliance team
    • call or log the concern on the Johnson Controls Integrity Helpline

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to return to the Home menu.
